Call center and global outsourcing management consultants. We will help you with all aspects of your outsourcing project, including: - Analysis & Design - Implementation & Transition - Training & Training Development - Project Management - Management Consulting We are experienced in implementing and managing programs in the US, Canada, Latin America, Asia (including India, Philippines & China) as well as in Europe. We can also help take you to the newest call center location - South Africa.
